summary.span: 在 ASP.NET 網頁中透過標記文字啟用 Language-Integrated Query (LINQ)，以從資料物件擷取和修改資料。

span.span: Enables the use of Language-Integrated Query (LINQ) in an ASP.NET Web page through markup text to retrieve and modify data from a data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [作業的順序Order of Operations](#order_of_operations) - [排序資料Ordering Data](#ordering_data) - [分組資料Grouping Data](#grouping_data) - [資料修改Data Modifications](#data_modifications) - [在執行階段的評估值Evaluating Values at Run Time](#evaluating_value_at_run_time) - [使用預存程序Working with Stored Procedures](#working_with_stored_procedures) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction Language Integrated Query (LINQ) 是定義一組查詢運算子，可讓在任何以宣告方式表示周遊、 篩選和投射作業的查詢語法。以.NET 為基礎的程式設計語言。Language-Integrated Query (LINQ) is a query syntax that defines a set of query operators that enable traversal, filter, and projection operations to be expressed in a declarative way in any .NET-based programming language. 資料物件可以是記憶體中資料收集或表示資料庫資料的物件。The data object can be an in-memory data collection or an object that represents data from a database. 您可以擷取或修改的資料，而不需要撰寫 SQL 命令，針對每個作業。You can retrieve or modify the data without having to write SQL commands for each operation. 控制項可讓您在 ASP.NET 網頁中使用 LINQ，藉由設定屬性以標記文字。The control enables you to use LINQ in an ASP.NET Web page by setting properties in markup text. 控制項會用來自動產生資料命令的 LINQ to SQL。The control uses LINQ to SQL to automatically generate the data commands. 如需有關 LINQ to SQL 的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [LINQ to SQL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655)。For more information about LINQ to SQL, see [LINQ to SQL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655). 當您要從記憶體中的資料集合中擷取資料時，您設定類別，其中包含資料集合的屬性。When you are retrieving data from an in-memory data collection, you set the property to the class that contains the data collection. 您設定屬性或欄位傳回的資料集合的屬性。You set the property to the property or field that returns the data collection. 比方說，您可能會有類別，名為`Person`，其中包含一個名為屬性`FavoriteCities`所傳回的字串值陣列。For example, you might have a class named `Person` that contains a property named `FavoriteCities` that returns an array of string values. 在此情況下，您設定屬性，以`Person`並設定屬性設`FavoriteCities`。In that case, you set the property to `Person` and set the property to `FavoriteCities`. 當您查詢資料庫時，您必須先建立代表資料庫與資料表的實體類別。When you are querying a database, you must first create entity classes that represent the database and its tables. 您可以使用[!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_long](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-long-md.md)]或 SqlMetal.exe 公用程式來產生這些類別。You can use the [!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_long](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-long-md.md)] or the SqlMetal.exe utility to generate these classes. 然後，您設定屬性，以代表資料庫的類別，並設定屬性，以代表資料庫資料表的內容。You then set the property to the class that represents the database and set the property to the property that represents the database table. ## 作業的順序Order of Operations 控制項適用於資料作業順序如下：The control applies data operations in the following order: 1. 位置 （指定要傳回的資料記錄）。Where (specify which data records to return). 2. Order By （排序）。Order By (sort). 3. Group By （共用的值彙總的資料記錄） 中。Group By (aggregate data records that share values). 4. 依 （排序分組的資料） 中的群組。Order Groups By (sort grouped data). 5. 選取 （指定哪些欄位或屬性傳回）。Select (specify which fields or properties to return). 6. 自動排序 （由使用者選取的屬性排序資料記錄）。Auto-sort (sort data records by a property that the user has selected). 7. 自動頁面 （擷取使用者所選取的資料記錄的子集）。Auto-page (retrieve a subset of data records that were selected by the user). 您可以將條件加入至來篩選從查詢傳回的資料記錄的屬性。You can add conditions to the property to filter the data records that are returned from a query. 如果未設定屬性，控制從資料物件擷取每一筆記錄。If the property is not set, the control retrieves every record from the data object. ## 排序資料Ordering Data 您使用屬性來指定從傳回的資料，排序所依據的屬性名稱。You use the property to specify the names of properties from the returned data to sort by. > [!NOTE] > 當您使用用來控制[!INCLUDE[ss2k](~/includes/ss2k-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[ssEW](~/includes/ssew-md.md)]並屬性設定為`true`，您必須提供值，以在屬性。When you use the control with [!INCLUDE[ss2k](~/includes/ss2k-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[ssEW](~/includes/ssew-md.md)] and the property is set to `true`, you must provide a value in the property. 根據預設，屬性是`true`。By default, the property is `true`. 如果您將值指派給屬性，您必須也包含所有 identity 資料行在查詢中傳回的屬性清單中。If you assign a value to the property, you must also include all identity columns in the list of properties that is returned in the query. ## 分組資料Grouping Data 您使用屬性，以指定哪一個屬性用來合併具有相同值的資料記錄。You use the property to specify which properties are used to consolidate data records that have the same values. 分組資料，您可以包含`Key`並`It`，以動態方式建立所在內容，在屬性。When you group data, you can include `Key` and `It`, which are dynamically created properties, in the property. `Key`屬性是用來將資料分組一個或多個屬性的值。The `Key` property refers to the values in the property or properties that were used to group the data. 例如，如果您依屬性分組`Category`，則`Key`屬性會包含中的所有唯一值`Category`屬性。For example, if you group by a property named `Category`, the `Key` property will contain all unique values in the `Category` property. `It`屬性參考的資料群組中的個別記錄的集合。The `It` property refers to a collection of individual records in a grouping of data. 您可以反覆`It`屬性，以擷取分組作業中已合併的個別記錄。You can iterate over the `It` property to retrieve the individual records that have been consolidated in the grouping operation. 例如，如果您依屬性分組`Category`，則`It`屬性包含所有共用常見值中的個別記錄`Category`屬性。For example, if you group by a property named `Category`, the `It` property contains all the individual records that share a common value in the `Category` property. 您使用屬性來指定要用來排序群組的資料的屬性。You use the property to specify the properties to use for sorting the grouped data. 當您在群組資料，屬性會指定如何排序分組的資料內的個別記錄。When you group data, the property specifies how the individual records within the grouped data are sorted. 根據預設，控制從資料物件擷取所有屬性的值。By default, the control retrieves values for all the properties from a data object. 您使用屬性來指定要傳回如果您想要使用 可用的屬性子集的屬性。You use the property to specify which properties to return if you want to work with a subset of available properties. 選取的作業會套用之後 Where、 Order By 和 Group By 作業。The Select operation is applied after the Where, Order By, and Group By operations. 因此，如果您在 Select 子句中建立的別名，別名無法使用。 在其他子句Therefore, if you create an aliased name in a Select clause, the alias is not available in the other clauses. ## 資料修改Data Modifications 您可以指定是否啟用資料修改，以利用， ，和屬性。You can specify whether data modifications are enabled by using the , , and properties. 修改資料的使用者介面控制項通常會提供透過資料繫結控制項，例如控制項。The user interface for modifying data from a control is typically provided through a data-bound control, such as a control. 除了設定， ，或到`true`，啟用自動的資料修改所需的下列條件：In addition to setting , , or to `true`, the following conditions are required to enable automatic data modifications: - 屬性無法指派值。The property cannot be assigned a value. - 屬性無法指派值。The property cannot be assigned a value. - 指派給類別屬性必須衍生自。The class that is assigned to the property must derive from . - 指派給屬性屬性必須衍生自。The property that is assigned to the property must derive from . 您可以限制有兩種資料繫結控制項中所顯示的屬性。You can restrict which properties are displayed in a data-bound control in two ways. 您可以設定屬性的子集屬性，也可以定義資料繫結控制項的欄位加上控制項。You can either set the property to a subset of properties, or you can define the fields for a data-bound control by adding controls. 不過，如果您將設定屬性，表示無法啟用自動更新、 插入和刪除作業。However, if you set the property, it means that automatic update, insert, and delete operations cannot be enabled. 如果您想要啟用自動的資料修改，當您使用的可用屬性子集，請勿設定屬性。If you want to enable automatic data modifications while you work with a subset of available properties, do not set the property. 相反地，從資料物件擷取所有屬性，並管理要顯示哪些使用資料繫結控制項。Instead, retrieve all properties from the data object and manage which ones are displayed by using the data-bound control. 當您使用控制項或控制項，您也必須設定或是屬性，以`false`。When you use the control or the control, you must also set the or properties to `false`. 這可防止自動包括按鈕來編輯和刪除資料的資料繫結控制項。This prevents the data-bound control from automatically including buttons for editing and deleting the data. 不會顯示在資料繫結控制項中的任何值會儲存在檢視狀態。Any values that are not displayed in the data-bound control are stored in view state. 它們不變時傳遞至資料來源執行資料更新。They are passed unchanged to the data source when the data update is performed. ## 在執行階段的評估值Evaluating Values at Run Time 如果您有要在執行階段排序，評估值篩選，或群組值，您可以將參數加入至， ， ，或集合。If you have to evaluate values at run time for ordering, filtering, or grouping values, you can add parameters to the , , , or collections. 如果您想要指定預設值，您可以新增參數至集合。If you want to specify default values, you can add parameters to the collection. 如果您想要檢查或修改值，執行資料作業之前，您可以處理， ， ，或事件。If you want to examine or modify values before the data operation is executed, you can handle the , , , or events. 若要取消資料作業，或檢查您根據使用者輸入的資料類別中設定屬性時，所發生的驗證錯誤，您也可以處理這些事件。You can also handle these events in order to cancel the data operation or to examine validation errors that occurred when you set properties in the data class based on user input. 若要在資料作業完成之後，請檢查值，處理， ， ，或事件。To examine values after the data operation has finished, handle the , , , or events. ## 使用預存程序Working with Stored Procedures 您使用來擷取預存程序中的資料，藉由建立的事件處理常式的控制項事件。You use the control to retrieve data from a stored procedure by creating an event handler for the event. 在事件處理常式中，您呼叫方法表示預存程序的資料內容類別中，並將結果設屬性物件。In the event handler, you call the method in the data context class that represents the stored procedure and set the result to the property of the object. 如果您想要啟用自動更新、 插入和刪除作業的資料，從方法傳回的型別必須符合在指定的型別屬性。If you want to enable automatic update, insert, and delete operations for the data, the type that is returned from the method must match the type that is specified in the property. 如需建立資料內容方法的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 對應至預存程序和函式 （O/R 設計工具） 建立 DataContext 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e7ca32f1-50b3-48af-ad92-ceafd749296a)。For more information about creating data context methods, see [How to: Create DataContext methods mapped to stored procedures and functions (O/R Designer)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e7ca32f1-50b3-48af-ad92-ceafd749296a). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列範例所示會從名為實體類別擷取資料的控制項`Products`。The following example shows a control that retrieves data from an entity class named `Products`. 實體類別已產生使用[!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_short](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-short-md.md)]或 SqlMetal.exe 公用程式。The entity class could have been generated by using the [!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_short](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-short-md.md)] or the SqlMetal.exe utility. 屬性設定為傳回有一個值的記錄`Price`大於 50 的屬性。The property is set to return only records that have a value in the `Price` property greater than 50. A控制項繫結至控制項來顯示資料。A control is bound to the control to display the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/cs/Default5.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/vb/Default5.aspx#5)] 下列範例所示控制項，可讓使用者更新、 刪除和插入資料來源中的記錄。The following example shows a control that enables users to update, delete, and insert records in the data source. A控制項繫結至控制項，並可讓使用者查看和修改資料。A control is bound to the control and enables users to see and modify the data. 請注意，不含 SQL 命令，才能選取、 更新、 刪除或插入記錄。Notice that no SQL commands are required in order to select, update, delete, or insert the records. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/cs/Default2.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/vb/Default2.aspx#2)] 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式所設定的資料物件的事件會根據在網頁中的值。The following example shows an event handler for the event that sets the data object based on a value in the Web page. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/cs/Default3.aspx.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/vb/Default3.aspx.vb#3)] 下列範例所示控制項設定的兩個資料行的群組。The following example shows a control that is configured to group by two columns. `Key`屬性會參考具有兩個屬性的物件`ProductCategory`和`Color`。The `Key` property references an object that has two properties, `ProductCategory` and `Color`. 所表示之物件`It`是已重新命名 （別名） `Products`。The object represented by `It` is renamed (aliased) to `Products`. 已重新命名`Products`物件包含在群組中的個別記錄的集合。The renamed `Products` object contains a collection of the individual records in a grouping. 每個執行個體包含所有資料行，從`Products`資料表。Each instance will contain all the columns from the `Products` table. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy/vb/Default.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範兩個控制項顯示資料的在上述範例中的控制項。The following example shows two controls that display the data from the control in the previous example. 一控制項會顯示群組的資料，以及其他控制項會顯示個別產品屬於該群組的名稱。One control displays the grouped data, and the other control displays the individual names of products that belong to that group. 巢狀的資料繫結控制項的屬性設定為`Products`，這是別名`It`物件。The nested data-bound control's property is set to `Products`, which is the alias for the `It` object. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy/cs/Default.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy/vb/Default.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 控制項是否會根據 集合中的值，動態建立 ORDER BY 子句。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control dynamically creates an Order By clause based on values in the collection.

value.span: 如果控制項會建立 Order By 子句，否則。

span.span: if the control creates the Order By clause; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您設定屬性，以`true`，則控制項會動態建立 Order By 子句中的值為基礎的集合。When you set the property to `true`, the control dynamically creates an Order By clause that is based on the values in the collection. 控制項第一個參數所排序的資料，然後另外排序每個額外參數的資料。The control sorts the data by the first parameter and then additionally sorts the data for each additional parameter. 參數包含`null`或 Order By 子句中不包含空值。Parameters that contain `null` or an empty value are not included in the Order By clause. 您未設定屬性時設定為`true`，因為剖析器會動態建立 Order By 子句。You do not set the property when the is set to `true`, because the parser dynamically creates the Order By clause. 控制項時擲回例外狀況設為`true`而屬性會被指派值。The control throws an exception if the is set to `true` and the property is assigned values. ## Examples 下列範例所示用來控制設定為`true`。The following example shows a control with the set to `true`. 參數包含在從選取的排序依據之屬性的資料名稱的使用者的集合控制項。A parameter is included in the collection that orders the data based on the property name that a user selects from a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/cs/Default8.aspx#8)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/vb/Default8.aspx#8)]

member this.AutoGenerateWhereClause : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 控制項是否根據 集合中所定義的值動態地建立 Where 子句。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control dynamically creates a Where clause based on values defined in the collection.

value.span: 如果 控制項要建立 Where 子句則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control will create the Where clause; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您設定屬性，以`true`，則控制項會動態建立 Where 子句中的參數集合。When you set the property to `true`, the control dynamically creates the Where clause from the parameters in the collection. 您將新增至每個參數集合必須有其屬性設定為符合所查詢資料物件中的屬性的值。Each parameter that you add to the collection must have its property set to a value that matches a property in the data object that is being queried. 自動產生子句會檢查是否在指定的值集合等於資料物件中的相符屬性的值。The automatically generated Where clause will check whether the value specified in the collection equals the value of the matching property in the data object. 如果您提供多個參數，與邏輯連結參數`AND`作業。If you provide more than one parameter, the parameters are linked with a logical `AND` operation. 參數包含`null`或空值不包含在 Where 子句。Parameters that contain `null` or an empty value are not included in the Where clause. 自動產生子句可以只測試是否相等，並可以連結參數只能搭配`AND`作業。The automatically generated clause can test only for equality and can link parameters only with the `AND` operation. 未設定屬性，以`true`如果您必須新增不會測試是否相等的條件，或如果您有關聯的參數`OR`作業。Do not set the property to `true` if you have to add a condition that does not test for equality or if you have to relate parameters with the `OR` operation. 您可以完成這些工作，藉由設定屬性，以`false`並加入中的預留位置屬性中每個參數集合。You can accomplish these tasks by setting the property to `false` and adding placeholders in the property for each parameter in the collection. 在 屬性，與每個預留位置名稱前加上 @ 符號。In the property, preface each placeholder name with the @ symbol. 您未設定屬性時屬性是`true`，因為剖析器會動態建立 Where 子句。You do not set the property when the property is `true`, because the parser dynamically creates the Where clause. 控制項時擲回例外狀況屬性是`true`而屬性會被指派值。The control throws an exception if the property is `true` and the property is assigned values. ## Examples 下列範例所示用來控制設定為`true`。The following example shows a control with the set to `true`. A控制項繫結至控制項來顯示從查詢傳回的資料。A control is bound to the control to display the data that is returned from the query. A也就是包含控制項填入三個值。A control is included that is populated with three values. 參數包含在具有名稱設定為集合`Category,`會比對其中一個資料物件的屬性。A parameter is included in the collection with the name set to `Category,` which matches one of the properties of the data object. 其屬性設定為識別碼控制項。Its property is set to the ID of the control. 控制項會自動建立來篩選記錄的屬性，根據使用者從選取的值控制項。The control automatically creates the property to filter records based on the value that the user selects from the control. 查詢會傳回記錄其`Category`屬性會比對使用者已從選取的值控制項。The query returns the records whose `Category` property matches the value that the user has selected from the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/cs/Default7.aspx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/vb/Default7.aspx#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性，以`true`若要啟用中的分頁控制項。Set the property to `true` to enable paging in the control. 若要讓使用者逐頁查看資料，連線提供介面，用於分頁的資料繫結控制項控制項。To enable the user to page through the data, connect a data-bound control that provides the interface for paging to the control. 當屬性設定為`true`，則控制項擷取資料繫結控制項中的一個頁面足以記錄。When the property is set to `true`, the control retrieves only enough records for one page in the data-bound control. 它會使用和方法來擷取目前頁面的記錄。It uses the and methods to retrieve the records for the current page. ## Examples 下列範例所示用來控制屬性設定為`true`並繫結至控制項控制項。The following example shows a control with the property set to `true` and a control that is bound to the control. 的屬性控制設為 `true`提供介面，讓使用者逐頁查看資料。The property of the control is set to `true` to provide the interface that lets users page through the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項支援兩種方法來排序資料。The control supports two approaches for sorting data. 您可以使用若要啟用執行階段排序的屬性，或者您可以設定屬性可定義在設計階段的排序。You can use the property to enable run-time sorting or you can set the property to define the sorting at design time. 設定屬性，以`true`以啟用排序為基礎的排序運算式，從資料繫結控制項的控制項。Set the property to `true` to enable sorting in a control that is based on the sort expression from a data-bound control. 資料繫結控制項提供介面，讓使用者在執行階段選取用來排序的屬性。The data-bound control provides the interface to enable the user to select at run time which property to use for sorting. 您可以透過程式設計方式設定藉由設定傳回資料的順序到用來排序屬性的屬性。You can programmatically set the order in which data is returned by setting the property to the property or properties used for sorting. 當屬性設定為屬性和屬性是`true`，從資料繫結控制項的排序運算式會在運算式之後套用屬性。When the property is set to a property and the property is `true`, the sort expression from the data-bound control is applied after the expression in the property. 因此，這會決定最終排序資料。Therefore, this determines the final sorting of the data. ## Examples 下列範例所示用來控制屬性設定為`true`並繫結至控制項控制項。The following example shows a control with the property set to `true` and a control that is bound to the control. 的屬性控制設為 `true`提供介面，讓使用者排序資料。The property of the control is set to `true` to provide the interface that lets users sort the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在建立內容型別物件的執行個體之後發生。

span.span: Occurs after an instance of the context type object is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理來檢查內容型別物件，或檢查建立物件時引發的例外狀況的事件。Handle the event to examine the context type object or examine exceptions that are raised while the object is being created. 擷取內容型別物件，從屬性與此事件相關聯的物件。You retrieve the context type object from the property of the object that is associated with this event. 擷取從資料作業期間引發的例外狀況屬性。You retrieve the exception that was raised during the data operation from the property. 內容型別物件在 select、 update、 insert 和刪除作業期間建立，並會在要求中重複使用。The context type object is created during select, update, insert, and delete operations and is reused throughout the request. 沒有時不會引發此事件一次。There is one time when the event is not raised. 這是當您以程式設計方式設定屬性的物件期間事件。This is when you programmatically set the property to an object during the event. 額外的條件時，不需要原始值儲存在檢視狀態或中的物件屬性會實作介面。An additional condition is that either the original values do not have to be stored in view state, or the object in the property implements the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ContextCreating As EventHandler(Of LinqDataSourceContextEventArgs)

summary.span: 在建立內容型別物件的執行個體之前發生。

span.span: Occurs before an instance of the context type object is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，控制項會建立中所指定類型的執行個體屬性。By default, the control creates an instance of the type that is specified in the property. 控制呼叫來建立物件的執行個體的資料內容物件的預設建構函式。The control calls the default constructor of the data context object to create an instance of the object. 可能是您必須使用非預設建構函式，或您必須建立不同的物件中所指定從屬性。It is possible that you have to use a non-default constructor or you have to create an object that differs from the one specified in the property. 在此情況下，您必須處理事件，並以手動方式建立資料內容物件。In that case, you must handle the event and manually create the data context object. 選取、 更新、 插入和刪除作業期間，會建立內容型別物件。The context type object is created during select, update, insert, and delete operations. 沒有時不會引發此事件一次。There is one time when the event is not raised. 這是當您以程式設計方式設定屬性中的事件處理常式的物件事件。This is when you programmatically set the property to an object in an event handler for the event. 額外的條件時，不需要原始值儲存在檢視狀態或中的物件屬性會實作介面。An additional condition is that either the original values do not have to be stored in view state, or the object in the property implements the interface. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用非預設建構函式期間建立的資料內容物件事件。The following example shows how to create the data context object by using a non-default constructor during the event. 此程式碼指派到物件屬性。The code assigns the object to the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextCreating#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextCreating/cs/Default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextCreating#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextCreating/vb/Default.aspx.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用控制項從記憶體中的資料集合或資料庫擷取資料，您必須指定兩個屬性。When you use the control to retrieve data from either an in-memory data collection or a database, you must specify two properties. 第一個是代表資料來源的資料內容類別。The first is a data context class that represents the data source. 第二個是包含資料的資料內容類別中的屬性。The second is a property in the data context class that contains the data. 您設定屬性的名稱之資料內容類別，以及設定資料集合，其中包含資料的屬性。You set the property to the name of the data context class and you set the property to the data collection that contains the data. 例如，當您從資料庫擷取資料，設定屬性，以代表資料庫類別的名稱。For example, when you retrieve data from a database, set the property to the name of the class that represents the database. 也設定屬性，以代表資料庫中的資料表的內容。Also set the property to the property that represents the table in the database. 若要從資料庫產生的類別，使用[!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_short](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-short-md.md)]或 SqlMetal.exe 公用程式，以自動產生這些類別。To generate classes from a database, use the [!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_short](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-short-md.md)] or the SqlMetal.exe utility to automatically generate those classes. 當您從記憶體中的資料集合，例如陣列擷取資料時，設定包含陣列屬性的類別名稱的屬性。When you retrieve data from an in-memory data collection such as an array, set the property to the name of the class that contains the array property. 然後設定屬性，以取得陣列的屬性。Then set the property to the property that gets the array. 若要啟用自動更新，插入或刪除作業，透過控制項，指派給類別屬性必須衍生自。To enable automatic update, insert, or delete operations through the control, the class assigned to the property must derive from . 此外，將屬性指派給屬性必須衍生自。In addition, the property assigned to the property must derive from . 如果您不需要啟用自動更新、 插入或刪除作業，您可以指派任何類型的類別名稱屬性。If you do not need to enable automatic update, insert, or delete operations, you can assign the name of any type of class to the property. 如需有關如何從類別的執行個體中選取資料的資訊，請參閱屬性。For information about how to select data from an instance of a class, see the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性，以包含字串陣列的類別。The following example shows how to set the property to a class that contains an array of strings. 它也會示範如何將屬性設定為類別 (所產生[!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_short](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-short-md.md)])，表示資料庫。It also shows how to set the property to a class (generated by the [!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_short](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-short-md.md)]) that represents a database. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Overview/cs/Default.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Overview/vb/Default.aspx#2)] 名為的類別`ExampleDataContext`，表示資料庫資料表不會顯示在此範例中。The class named `ExampleDataContext` that represents the database table is not shown in this example. 此範例正常運作，您必須建立這個類別加上具名的 Example.dbml 並拖曳資料表名為到電影的 LINQ 到 SQL 類別[!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_short](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-short-md.md)]。For this example to work, you must create this class by adding a LINQ To SQL class named Example.dbml and dragging a table named Movie onto the [!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_short](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-short-md.md)]. 類別，名為`ExampleDataContext`屬性，名為`Movies`產生。A class named `ExampleDataContext` with a property named `Movies` is generated. 下列範例顯示名為的類別`MovieLibrary`，用來參考之控制項。The following example shows the class named `MovieLibrary` that is referenced in the control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Overview/cs/App_Code/MovieLibrary.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Overview/vb/App_Code/MovieLibrary.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您就不必呼叫從您的程式碼的方法。Typically, you do not have to call the method from your code. 當您使用與資料繫結控制項，將資料繫結控制項的控制項將會自動呼叫方法，當使用者採取動作來刪除記錄。When you use a control with a data-bound control, the data-bound control will automatically call the method when the user takes action to delete a record. 明確地呼叫方法，當您想要建立自己的程序，刪除資料。You explicitly call the method when you want to create your own process for deleting data. 例如，您可以呼叫根據外的資料繫結控制項的事件的方法，當您想要刪除的記錄。For example, you can call the method when you want to delete a record based on an event outside the data-bound control.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Deleting As EventHandler(Of LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs)

summary.span: 在刪除作業之前發生。

span.span: Occurs before a delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件，以便驗證被刪除，以檢查是否有從資料類別，來變更值，以刪除作業之前，或取消刪除作業的資料驗證錯誤的物件。Handle the event to validate the object to be deleted, to examine data validation errors from the data class, to change a value before the delete operation, or to cancel the delete operation. 控制傳遞物件的事件處理常式事件。The control passes a object to event handlers for the event. 物件包含的資料將會被刪除，並可讓您取消刪除作業。The object contains the data that will be deleted and enables you to cancel the delete operation. 如果資料類別會擲回例外狀況物件包含在該例外狀況屬性。If the data class throws a exception, the object contains that exception in the property. 如果事件處理常式中擲回例外狀況事件，您必須處理該事件處理常式中的例外狀況。If an exception is thrown in an event handler for the event, you must handle the exception in that event handler. 例外狀況不會傳遞至事件處理常式事件 (透過屬性物件)。The exception will not be passed to an event handler for the event (through the property of the object). 屬性包含之後，會擲回的例外狀況事件。The property contains only the exceptions that are thrown after the event. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 程式碼取消刪除作業中的屬性為基礎屬性和值，以從網頁。The code cancels the delete operation based on a property in the property and a value from the Web page. 在範例中，當`OnSale`屬性設定為`true`，使用者必須選取確認應該刪除記錄的控制項。In the example, when the `OnSale` property is set to `true`, the user must select a control to confirm that a record should be deleted. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting/cs/Default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting/vb/Default.aspx.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性，以`true`當您想讓使用者可以刪除資料錄透過控制項。Set the property to `true` when you want to enable users to delete a data record through the control. 當已`true`，則控制項用來自動建立命令以刪除資料的 LINQ to SQL。When is `true`, the control uses LINQ to SQL to automatically create the command to delete the data. 您必須包含的介面可讓使用者選取的記錄，若要刪除，例如控制項。You must include an interface that lets users select a record to delete, such as a control. 控制項不支援自動刪除作業時屬性或屬性設定。The control does not support automatic delete operations when the property or the property is set. 在此情況下，控制項會擲回例外狀況，如果嘗試刪除作業。In that case, the control throws an exception if a delete operation is tried. ## Examples 下列範例所示控制項，其設定為`true`。The following example shows a control that has set to `true`. A控制項顯示資料，並建立可讓使用者刪除的資料記錄的按鈕。A control displays the data and creates a button that lets users delete a data record. A控制項顯示的資料，並顯示一個按鈕，切換插入的模式，使用者可建立並儲存新記錄的控制項。A control displays the data and displays a button that switches the control to insert mode where users can create and save a new record. remarks.format: ## Remarks 從 LINQ 到 SQL 資料內容物件中選取資料時，才會使用屬性。The property is only used when selecting data from a LINQ To SQL data context object. 當您與唯讀資料互動時，設定屬性設`false`改善效能，因為資料不會快取來判斷是否已變更。When you are interacting with read-only data, setting the property to `false` improves performance because the data is not cached to determine if it has changed. 不過，它也會停用延後的查詢執行。However, it also disables deferred query execution. 此屬性必須設為`true`如果您想要使用延後的查詢執行。This property must be set to `true` if you want to use deferred query execution.

member this.GroupBy : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指定用於對擷取的資料進行分組的屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies which properties are used for grouping the retrieved data.

value.span: 字串，用來建立 Group By 子句。

span.span: A string that is used to create the Group By clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用屬性來指定合併具有相同值的資料記錄會使用哪些屬性。You use the property to specify which properties are used for consolidating data records that have the same values. 例如，如果您設定屬性，以`Name`中的所有記錄的查詢具有相同`Name`屬性值傳回成單一彙總記錄。For example, if you set the property to `Name`, all the records in the query that have the same `Name` property value are returned as a single consolidated record. 您可以指派多個屬性住中的所有屬性的屬性`new`函式，並使用逗號分隔每個屬性。You can assign more than one property to the property by enclosing all the properties in the `new` function and separating each property by using a comma. 例如，若依屬性群組要`Name`，然後`Category`，將屬性設`new(Name, Category)`。For example, to group by the properties `Name` and then `Category`, set the property to `new(Name, Category)`. 屬性中用來分組的值會傳回產生的屬性，名為透過`Key`。The values in the property that are used for grouping are returned through a generated property named `Key`. 您包含`Key`屬性中的擷取群組的值的屬性。You include the `Key` property in the property to retrieve the grouped values. 您可以設定`Key`屬性，以使用別名`As`關鍵字，但您不需要使用別名。You can set the `Key` property to an alias by using the `As` keyword, but you are not required to use an alias. 例如，您可能會設定屬性至屬性，名為`Category`。For example, you might set the property to a property named `Category`. 您可以擷取從合併的值`Category`屬性，藉由設定屬性設`new(Key As ProductCategory)`。You can retrieve the consolidated values from the `Category` property by setting the property to `new(Key As ProductCategory)`. 您可以存取在群組中的個別記錄包括`It`屬性中的屬性。You can access the individual records in a grouping by including the `It` property in the property. `It`屬性包含的共用中的群組屬性的值的記錄集合。The `It` property contains a collection of records that share a value in the grouped property. 您可以反覆`It`屬性來擷取個別的記錄。You can iterate over the `It` property to retrieve the individual records. 屬性通常會搭配彙總方法。The property is often used with aggregation methods. 您可以使用下列彙總方法：You can use the following aggregate methods: - `Count()` - `Average(` *資料行* `)``Average(` *column* `)` - `Sum(` *資料行* `)``Sum(` *column* `)` - `Max(` *資料行* `)``Max(` *column* `)` - `Min(` *資料行* `)``Min(` *column* `)` - `Where(` *條件* `)``Where(` *condition* `)` - `Any()` - `All(` *條件* `)``All(` *condition* `)` 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB: LinqDataSource Web Server Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/104cfc3f-7385-47d3-8a51-830dfa791136)並[如何： 群組和彙總的資料使用 LinqDataSource 控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b922cf69-251f-4158-b405-ea960993a1af)。For more information, see [NIB: LinqDataSource Web Server Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/104cfc3f-7385-47d3-8a51-830dfa791136) and [How to: Group and Aggregate Data Using the LinqDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b922cf69-251f-4158-b405-ea960993a1af). ## Examples 下列範例所示屬性，名為依據群組傳回的資料控制項`Category`。The following example shows a control that groups the returned data by a property named `Category`. 它會傳回共用的值，並計算平均的價格為群組的記錄。It returns the shared values and calculates the average price for the grouped records. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/cs/Default3.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/vb/Default3.aspx#3)] 下列範例所示控制項設定的兩個資料行的群組。The following example shows a control that is configured to group by two columns. `Key`屬性會參考具有兩個屬性的物件`ProductCategory`和`Color`。The `Key` property references an object that has two properties, `ProductCategory` and `Color`. 所表示之物件`It`已重新命名`Products`。The object represented by `It` is renamed `Products`. 已重新命名`Products`物件包含的群組中的個別記錄集合，而每個執行個體包含從 Products 資料表的所有資料行。The renamed `Products` object contains a collection of the individual records in a grouping, and each instance contains all the columns from the Products table. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy/vb/Default.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範兩個來顯示將資料從控制項在上述範例中的控制項。The following example shows two controls for displaying the data from the control in the previous example. 一控制項會顯示群組的資料和其他控制項會顯示個別產品屬於該群組的名稱。One control displays the grouped data and the other control displays the individual names of products that belong to that group. 巢狀的資料繫結控制項的屬性設定為`Products`，這是別名`It`物件。The nested data-bound control's property is set to `Products`, which is the alias for the `It` object. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy/cs/Default.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy/vb/Default.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GroupByParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 取得用於建立 Group By 子句的參數集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that are used to create the Group By clause.

value.span: 用來建立 Group By 子句的參數。

span.span: The parameters that are used to create the Group By clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項使用中的參數集合，以在執行階段建立 Group By 子句。The control uses parameters in the collection to create the Group By clause at run time. 通常您不會使用來分組資料的集合。Typically you will not use the collection to group data. 相反地，您可以使用屬性。Instead, you can use the property. 您使用集合時，才在 Group By 子句中的值必須在執行階段設定，以及該值不是屬性名稱。You use the collection only when a value in the Group By clause must be set at run time and that value is not a property name. 例如，使用集合來分組資料根據`LastName`資料記錄中的屬性值等於使用者所提供的值。For example, use the collection to group data based on whether the `LastName` property in the data records equals a value provided by the user. 如果您要依屬性分組資料，而且該屬性不需要在執行階段進行設定，您可以定義中的 [群組] 屬性屬性。If you want to group data by a property and that property does not have to be set at run time, you can define the grouping property in the property. 例如，若要從資料庫資料表中傳回的值分組`LastName`，將至"LastName"，不含任何參數。For example, to return values from a database table grouped by `LastName`, set to "LastName" without any parameters. 如果您想要動態群組資料屬性，建立的事件處理常式事件和自訂所需的屬性。If you want to dynamically group data by a property, create an event handler for the event and customize the property as needed. 您無法指派屬性的名稱做為參數的值集合。You cannot assign the name of a property as the value for a parameter in the collection. 新增參數集合，當您想要新增條件，以必須在執行階段設定的屬性。You add parameters to the collection when you want to add a condition to the property that must be set at run time. 若要設定值，在集合中，您指派給每個參數的名稱，然後再新增內某個預留位置屬性的具名參數。To set values in the collection, you assign a name to each parameter and then add a placeholder in the property for that named parameter. 在 Group By 子句中前, 加上每一參數名稱以 @ 符號。In the Group By clause, preface each parameter name with the @ symbol.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 Insert(class System.Collections.IDictionary values) cil managed
Public Function Insert (values As IDictionary) As Integer

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您就不必呼叫從您的程式碼的方法。Typically, you do not have to call the method from your code. 資料繫結控制項將會自動呼叫方法，當使用者採取動作來插入新的記錄。The data-bound control will automatically call the method when the user takes action to insert a new record. 明確地呼叫方法，當您想要建立自己的程序插入資料。You explicitly call the method when you want to create your own process for inserting data. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以程式設計方式於使用者按一下按鈕之後，資料來源中插入新的記錄。The following example shows how to programmatically insert a new record in the data source after the user clicks a button. 程式碼會傳遞物件，其中包含預設值來方法。The code passes a object that contains default values to the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Insert#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Insert/cs/Default2.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Insert#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Insert/vb/Default2.aspx.vb#1)] 下列範例顯示上一個範例的標記。The following example shows the markup for the previous example. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Insert#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Insert/cs/Default2.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Insert#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Insert/vb/Default2.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Inserted As EventHandler(Of LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs)

summary.span: 在插入作業完成時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an insert operation has finished.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件攔截任何例外狀況，從 插入作業，或在插入作業完成之後，請檢查的值。Handle the event to catch any exceptions from the insert operation or to examine the values after the insert operation has finished. 您可以擷取新的值，透過傳遞至事件處理常式的物件。You can retrieve the new values through the object that is passed to event handlers. 例如，您可以使用擷取新的資料記錄的資料庫所產生的識別屬性的物件。For example, you can use the object to retrieve the identity property generated by a database for a new data record. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立事件處理常式檢查例外狀況，並擷取新資料錄的識別屬性的事件。The following example shows how to create an event handler for the event that checks for exceptions and retrieves the identity property for the new record. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Inserting As EventHandler(Of LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs)

summary.span: 在插入作業之前發生。

span.span: Occurs before an insert operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 處理事件，以便驗證要插入、 檢查來自資料類別，並將值插入作業之前，變更或取消插入作業的資料驗證錯誤的物件。Handle the event to validate the object to be inserted, to examine data validation errors from the data class, to change a value before the insert operation, or to cancel the insert operation. 物件傳遞至事件處理常式，此事件報告功能包含在資料來源中插入新的物件。The object passed to event handlers for this event contains the new object to insert in the data source. 如果插入作業期間，發生驗證錯誤物件包含的資料類別所擲回驗證例外狀況。If a validation error occurs during the insert operation, the object contains the validation exceptions that are thrown by the data class. 如果要插入的值不符合在資料類別中，屬性的型別，或如果它未通過自訂驗證檢查，就會發生驗證錯誤。A validation error occurs if a value to be inserted does not match the type of the property in the data class, or if it does not pass a custom validation check. 中的事件處理常式事件，您可以擷取驗證例外狀況並採取適當動作。In an event handler for the event, you can retrieve the validation exceptions and take appropriate action. 如果事件處理常式中擲回例外狀況事件，您必須處理該事件處理常式中的例外狀況。If an exception is thrown in an event handler for the event, you must handle the exception in that event handler. 例外狀況不會傳遞至事件處理常式事件 (透過屬性物件)。The exception will not be passed to an event handler for the event (through the property of the object). 屬性包含之後，會擲回的例外狀況事件。The property contains only the exceptions that are thrown after the event. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式修改資料之前插入作業的事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event that modifies data before the insert operation. 從物件屬性會轉換名為的型別`Product`。The object from the property is cast to a type named `Product`. `DateModified`屬性`Product`物件設定為目前的日期和時間。The `DateModified` property of the `Product` object is set to the current date and time. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting/cs/Default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting/vb/Default.aspx.vb#1)] 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式擷取驗證例外狀況的事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event that retrieves validation exceptions. ```vb Protected Sub LinqDataSource_Inserting(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs) If (e.Exception IsNot Nothing) Then For Each innerException As KeyValuePair(Of String, Exception) _ In e.Exception.InnerExceptions Label1.Text &= innerException.Key & ": " & _ innerException.Value.Message & "
" Next e.ExceptionHandled = True End If End Sub ``` ```csharp protected void LinqDataSource_Inserting(object sender, LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs e) { if (e.Exception != null) { foreach (KeyValuePair innerException in e.Exception.InnerExceptions) { Label1.Text += innerException.Key + ": " + innerException.Value.Message + "
"; } e.ExceptionHandled = true; } } ``` 前一個範例會擷取驗證例外狀況。The previous example retrieves validation exceptions. 如果值不符合屬性類型，可能會擲回例外狀況。An exception might be thrown if a value does not match the type of the property. 它可能也會擲回類似下列範例中的自訂檢查。It might also be thrown from a customized check such as the one in the following example. `OnAgeChanging`方法會檢查數目`Age`屬性不是負數。The `OnAgeChanging` method checks that the number for the `Age` property is not negative. ```csharp partial void OnAgeChanging(int? value) { if (value < 0) { throw new Exception("Age cannot be a negative number."); } } ``` ```vb Private Sub OnAgeChanging(ByVal value As System.Nullable(Of Integer)) If (value < 0) Then Throw New Exception("Age cannot be a negative number.") End If End Sub ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InsertParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 取得插入作業期間所使用的參數集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that are used during an insert operation.

value.span: 插入作業期間所使用的參數。

span.span: The parameters that are used during an insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常會在插入作業所需的值會傳遞至資料繫結控制項的控制項。Typically the values that are needed for an insert operation are passed to the control by the data-bound control. 插入參數，當您想要提供的預設值或定義是否將空的值，您指定`null`。You specify insert parameters when you want to provide a default value or define whether to convert empty values to `null`. 您不必針對每個值插入，僅為使用者未提供值時，必須處理的值提供的參數。You do not have to provide a parameter for every value that will be inserted, only for the values that must be handled when the user does not provide a value. 您在中提供的值集合僅適用於使用資料來源中定義的但未繫結中的資料控制項欄位。The values that you provide in the collection are used only for fields that are defined in the data source but that are not bound in the data control. 例如，假設資料庫資料表有資料行名稱、 地址和郵遞區號，名為但繫結至資料表的控制項繫結只以名稱和地址欄位。For example, suppose a database table has columns that are named Name, Address, and PostalCode, but a control that is bound to the table is bound only to the Name and Address fields. 中的值集合將只用於 [郵遞區號] 欄位。The values in the collection will be used only for the PostalCode field. 它們不會用於名稱和地址 欄位。They will not be used for the Name and Address field. 這是，則為 true，即使那些欄位輸入任何值。This is true even if no value is entered for those fields. 如果資料中的所有欄位的資料繫結控制項的自動產生欄位來源，從任何值將用於集合。If the data-bound control autogenerates fields for all fields in the data source, no values from the collection will be used. ## Examples 下列範例所示控制項以提供預設值中的參數集合。The following example shows a control with a parameter that provides a default value in the collection. 如果使用者未提供的值`Category`屬性，參數所提供的預設值儲存在資料庫中。If the user does not provide a value for the `Category` property, the default value that is provided by the parameter is saved in the database. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/cs/Default9.aspx#9)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/vb/Default9.aspx#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ OrderBy { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.OrderBy : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指定用於對擷取之資料進行排序的欄位。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies which fields are used for ordering the retrieved data.

value.span: 字串，用來建立 Order By 子句。

span.span: A string that is used to create the Order By clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用屬性來指定要用來排序傳回的資料中的哪些屬性。You use the property to specify which properties from the returned data to use for sorting. 排序資料的屬性必須存在於原始資料來源，但它並沒有包含在屬性。The property for sorting the data must exist in the original data source, but it does not have to be included in the property. 您可以加上空格並`Ascending`， `ASC`， `Descending`，或`DESC`中的屬性字串來指定如何傳回已排序的資料。You can add a space and `Ascending`, `ASC`, `Descending`, or `DESC` to a property in the string in order to specify how the ordered data is returned. 您可以提供多個屬性在使用逗號分隔每個屬性的屬性。You can provide more than one property in the property by separating each property by using a comma. 比方說，要依具名的屬性`LastName`並`FirstName`，將"LastName、 FirstName 」 的屬性。For example, to order by properties named `LastName` and `FirstName`, set the property to "LastName, FirstName". > [!NOTE] > 當您使用用來控制[!INCLUDE[ss2k](~/includes/ss2k-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[ssEW](~/includes/ssew-md.md)]並屬性設定為`true`，您必須提供值，以在屬性。When you use the control with [!INCLUDE[ss2k](~/includes/ss2k-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[ssEW](~/includes/ssew-md.md)] and the property is set to `true`, you must provide a value in the property. 根據預設，屬性是`true`。By default, the property is `true`. 如果您將值指派給屬性，您必須也包含所有 identity 資料行在查詢中傳回的屬性清單中。If you assign a value to the property, you must also include all identity columns in the list of properties that is returned in the query. 如果屬性設定為`true`，在資料繫結控制項可以將排序運算式，以傳遞控制項在執行階段。If the property is set to `true`, a data-bound control can pass a sort expression to the control at run time. 可控制在套用之後，會套用從資料繫結控制項的排序運算式屬性。The control will apply the sort expression from the data-bound control after it applies the property. 因此，會傳回資料的排序運算式根據從資料繫結控制項。Therefore, the data is returned according to the sort expression from the data-bound control. ## Examples 下列範例會傳回以反向字母順序，根據值的資料`Category`屬性。The following example returns data in reverse alphabetical order based on values in the `Category` property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/cs/Default4.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/vb/Default4.aspx#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OrderByParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 取得用於建立 Order By 子句的參數集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that are used to create the Order By clause.

value.span: 用於建立 Order By 子句的參數。

span.span: The parameters that are used for creating the Order By clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項使用中的參數集合，以在執行階段建立 Order By 子句。The control uses parameters in the collection to create the Order By clause at run time. 您的設定通常屬性，以`true`當您將參數加入至集合。Typically you set the property to `true` when you add parameters to the collection. 當屬性設定為`true`，在每個參數集合加入 Order By 子句中指定的序列中集合。When the property is set to `true`, each parameter in the collection is added to the Order By clause in the sequence that they are specified in the collection. 當屬性是`true`，因為它們會依序套用，而且不會對應到預留位置顯示為沒有參數。When the property is `true`, the parameters do not have to be named because they are applied in sequence and are not matched to a placeholder. 如果您沒有在 Order By 子句中的執行階段設定值，您不必使用集合。If you do not have to set a value at run time in the Order By clause, you do not have to use the collection. 您可以定義要用於排序的資料中的欄位屬性。You can define the fields to use for ordering the data in the property. 例如，若要從資料庫資料表中傳回值依排序`LastName`，將至"LastName"，不含任何參數。For example, to return values from a database table ordered by `LastName`, set to "LastName" without any parameters. 您可以在 設定參數集合中預留位置的參數搭屬性，但這種方法具有有限的應用程式。You can set parameters in the collection and match the parameters to placeholders in the property, but this approach has limited application. 當您使用這種方法中的參數集合無法表示資料行名稱。When you use this approach, the parameters in the collection cannot represent a column name. 您可以將參數設定值，然後比較該數值到屬性中的值。You can set a parameter to a value and then compare that value to values in a property. 例如，您可以排序依據屬性中的值是否小於參數所表示的執行階段值的資料。For example, you can order the data based on whether the values in a property are less than the run-time value represented by the parameter. ## Examples 下列範例顯示將 屬性設定為 的 `true` 控制項。The following example shows a control with the property set to `true`. 參數包含在從選取的排序依據之屬性的資料名稱的使用者的集合控制項。A parameter is included in the collection that orders the data based on the property name that a user selects from a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/cs/Default8.aspx#8)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/vb/Default8.aspx#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ OrderGroupsBy { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.OrderGroupsBy : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定用於排序分組資料的欄位。

span.span: Gets or sets the fields that are used for ordering grouped data.

value.span: 字串，用來建立 Order Groups By 子句。

span.span: A string that is used to create the Order Groups By clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用屬性來指定如何排序群組的資料。You use the property to specify how the groups of data are sorted. 例如，您可以依分組`CategoryID`屬性，然後排序每個類別目錄識別碼分組的平均`Price`屬性。For example, you can group by the `CategoryID` property and then sort each category ID group by the average of the `Price` property. 您可以設定屬性只有在已分組的資料時。You can set the property only when you have grouped the data. 如果您設定屬性未設定屬性，控制項會擲回例外狀況。If you set the property without setting the property, the control throws an exception. 用來排序資料的屬性必須是此屬性，用來分組資料或在群組資料的彙總函式的結果。The property that is used to sort the data must be either a property that is used to group the data, or the result of an aggregation function on the grouped data. 若要指定資料的排序方式，加入一個空格和"Ascending"、"ASC"、 「 遞減 」 或"DESC"的字串中的屬性名稱字串。To specify how the data is sorted, you can add a space and the string "Ascending", "ASC", "Descending", or "DESC" to a property name in the string. 您可以指定多個屬性在屬性。You can specify more than one property in the property. 使用逗號分隔每個屬性。Separate each property by using a comma. ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何群組資料的使用兩個屬性，以及如何使用其中一個屬性排序分組的資料。The following example shows how to group the data by using two properties, and how to sort the grouped data by using one of those properties. 名為資料表中的資料`Products`藉由使用名為的屬性分組`CategoryID`和`Discontinued`。The data from a table named `Products` is grouped by using properties named `CategoryID` and `Discontinued`. 分組的資料會依照`CategoryID`屬性。The grouped data is sorted by the `CategoryID` property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy/vb/Default.aspx#1)] 下列範例會示範如何用來分組資料的屬性，以及如何排序它所依據的彙總函式的結果。The following example shows how to group the data by using a property, and how to sort it based on the results of an aggregation function. 將資料從`Products`資料表會依使用`CategoryID`屬性。The data from the `Products` table is grouped by using the `CategoryID` property. 排序依據的平均值`UnitPrice`每個群組內的屬性。It is sorted based on the average of the `UnitPrice` property within each group. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy/cs/Default2.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy/vb/Default2.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OrderGroupsByParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 取得用來建立 Order Groups By 子句的參數集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that are used to create the Order Groups By clause.

value.span: 用來建立 Order Groups By 子句的參數。

span.span: The parameters that are used to create the Order Groups By clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項使用中的參數來建立 Order Groups By 子句在執行階段的集合。The control uses parameters in the collection to create the Order Groups By clause at run time. 您新增值以只有當您必須在 Order Groups By 子句中的執行階段設定值的集合。You add values to the collection only when you must set values at run time in the Order Groups By clause. 您可以定義用來排序資料所使用的欄位屬性。You can define the fields that are used to order the data by using the property. 您可以在 設定參數集合中預留位置的參數搭屬性。You can set parameters in the collection and match the parameters to placeholders in the property. 不過，當您使用這種方法中的參數集合無法表示資料行名稱，還必須有值。However, when you use this approach, the parameters in the collection cannot represent a column name; they must represent values. 您可以將參數設定值，然後比較該屬性的值。You can set a parameter to a value and then compare that value to a property. 例如，您可以排序依據屬性中的值是否小於參數所表示的執行階段值的資料。For example, you can order the data based on whether the values in a property are less than the run-time value represented by the parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance object SaveViewState() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function SaveViewState () As Object
public: property System::String ^ Select { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Select : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定屬性以及擷取之資料中包含的計算值。

span.span: Gets or sets the properties and calculated values that are included in the retrieved data.

value.span: 用於建立 Select 子句的字串。

span.span: A string that is used to create the Select clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您未設定屬性，控制從資料物件擷取所有的屬性 （資料行）。If you do not set the property, the control retrieves all the properties (data columns) from the data object. 您使用屬性從物件擷取屬性的子集，或擷取資料時，計算新值。You use the property to retrieve a subset of properties from the object or to calculate new values when the data is being retrieved. 您指定要擷取所設定的屬性您想要在傳回的資料中包含的屬性名稱的屬性。You specify which properties to retrieve by setting the property to the names of the properties that you want to include in the returned data. 如果您從資料物件，擷取屬性的子集控制項會動態建立類別，其中包含您在中指定的屬性屬性。If you retrieve a subset of properties from the data object, the control dynamically creates a class that contains only the properties that you specify in the property. 如果您計算都不是資料物件中的屬性的屬性，也會動態建立類別。A class is also created dynamically if you calculate properties that are not properties in the data object. 在這些情況下，從查詢傳回的物件不是類別中所指定的執行個體屬性。In these cases, the object returned from the query is not an instance of the class that is specified in the property. 相反地，您必須使用`new`方法中的表示新的類別從查詢傳回的屬性。Instead, you must use the `new` method in the property to indicate that a new class is returned from the query. 例如，若要只傳回`FirstName`並`LastName`屬性的物件，包含多個這些屬性，設定屬性設`new(FirstName, LastName)`。For example, to return only the `FirstName` and `LastName` properties from an object that contains more than these properties, set the property to `new(FirstName, LastName)`. 控制項要以動態方式建立新的類別中所指定`new`方法。The control will dynamically create the new class that you specified in the `new` method. 您可以使用`As`關鍵字來將別名指派給選取的值。You can use the `As` keyword to assign an alias to a selected value. 如果您指派別名時，您必須包含中的別名屬性`new`方法。If you assign an alias, you must include the aliased properties in the `new` method. 繫結至結果的任何資料繫結控制項控制項必須由別名所參考屬性。Any data-bound control that binds to the results from the control must refer to the property by the alias. 比方說，如果您設定屬性，以`new(Region As SalesRegion, Revenue / 1000 As RevenueThousands)`，將資料繫結控制項可以存取兩個屬性，`SalesRegion`和`RevenueThousands`。For example, if you set the property to `new(Region As SalesRegion, Revenue / 1000 As RevenueThousands)`, the data-bound control can access two properties, `SalesRegion` and `RevenueThousands`. 您使用`new`函式中根據條件的屬性如下表所示。You use the `new` function in the property according to the conditions listed in the following table. |選用版Select|使用新的Use of new|範例Example| |------------|----------------|-------------| |單一屬性。Single property.|`new` 不需要。`new` not needed.|`Select="Category"`| |多個屬性。Multiple properties.|`new` 所需。`new` needed.|`Select="new(Cateogry, Name)"`| |單一或多個有別名的屬性。Single or multiple properties that have an alias.|`new` 所需。`new` needed.|`Select="new(Category As CategoryGroup)"`| 如果您想要啟用自動的資料修改，但不是想顯示從資料物件的所有屬性，請勿設定屬性。If you want to enable automatic data modifications, but you do not want to display all the properties from the data object, do not set the property. 相反地，管理透過資料繫結控制項顯示。Instead, manage the display through the data-bound control. 當您使用控制項或控制項，您也必須設定或屬性設`false`。When you use the control or the control, you must also set the or the property to `false`. 不會顯示在資料繫結控制項中的任何值會儲存在檢視狀態。Any values that are not displayed in the data-bound control are stored in view state. 它們不變時傳遞至資料來源執行資料更新。They are passed unchanged to the data source when the data update is performed. 分組資料的查詢中，您可以包含在彙總方法屬性。When you group data in the query, you can include aggregate methods in the property. 您可以使用下列彙總方法：You can use the following aggregate methods: - `Count()` - `Average(` *資料行* `)``Average(` *column* `)` - `Sum(` *資料行* `)``Sum(` *column* `)` - `Max(` *資料行* `)``Max(` *column* `)` - `Min(` *資料行* `)``Min(` *column* `)` - `Where(` *條件* `)``Where(` *condition* `)` - `Any()` - `All(` *條件* `)``All(` *condition* `)` 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB: LinqDataSource Web Server Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/104cfc3f-7385-47d3-8a51-830dfa791136)並[如何： 群組和彙總的資料使用 LinqDataSource 控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b922cf69-251f-4158-b405-ea960993a1af)。For more information, see [NIB: LinqDataSource Web Server Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/104cfc3f-7385-47d3-8a51-830dfa791136) and [How to: Group and Aggregate Data Using the LinqDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b922cf69-251f-4158-b405-ea960993a1af). 分組資料，您可以包含`Key`並`It`，以動態方式建立所在內容，在屬性。When you group data, you can include `Key` and `It`, which are dynamically created properties, in the property. `Key`屬性是用來將資料分組一個或多個屬性的值。The `Key` property refers to the values in the property or properties that were used to group the data. 例如，如果您依屬性分組`Category`，則`Key`屬性會包含在每個唯一值`Category`屬性。For example, if you group by a property named `Category`, the `Key` property will contain each unique value in the `Category` property. `It`屬性參考的資料群組中的個別記錄的集合。The `It` property refers to a collection of individual records in a grouping of data. 您可以反覆`It`屬性，以擷取分組作業中已合併的個別記錄。You can iterate over the `It` property to retrieve the individual records that have been consolidated in the grouping operation. 例如，如果您依屬性分組`Category`，則`It`屬性包含所有共用常見值中的個別記錄`Category`屬性。For example, if you group by a property named `Category`, the `It` property contains all the individual records that share a common value in the `Category` property. 如果您納入`It`中的關鍵字屬性將資料分組時，您必須將指派的別名`It`關鍵字。If you include the `It` keyword in the property when you group data, you must assign an alias to the `It` keyword. 控制項將會擲回例外狀況，如果`It`沒有別名。The control will throw an exception if `It` does not have an alias. 您可以指派至別名`Key`關鍵字，但這並非必要。You can assign an alias to the `Key` keyword, but this is not required. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定資料物件中的屬性子集的屬性。The following example shows how to set the property to a subset of properties in the data object. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/cs/Default10.aspx#10)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/vb/Default10.aspx#10)] 下列範例顯示如何擷取已用來分組資料的屬性中的值，以及擷取群組的資料錄的平均值。The following example shows how to retrieve values in a property that has been used to group data, and to retrieve the average for the grouped records. `Key`關鍵字包含曾經用於分組資料的屬性。The `Key` keyword contains the property that has been used for grouping data. 在此範例中，`Key`將包含共用的值從`ProductCategory`屬性。In this example, `Key` will contain the shared values from the `ProductCategory` property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/cs/Default3.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/vb/Default3.aspx#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Selected As EventHandler(Of LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs)

summary.span: 在資料擷取作業完成時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a data retrieval operation has finished.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理攔截任何例外狀況，從資料擷取作業，或擷取作業完成之後，請檢查資料物件的事件。Handle the event to catch any exceptions from the data retrieval operation or to examine the data object after the retrieval operation has finished. 物件是可從傳遞至事件處理常式的物件。The object is available from the object that is passed to event handlers.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Selecting As EventHandler(Of LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs)

summary.span: 在資料擷取作業之前發生。

span.span: Occurs before a data-retrieval operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件，執行下列工作：Handle the event in order to perform the following tasks: - 修改的資料擷取的參數。Modify parameters for data retrieval. - 以程式設計方式產生的查詢。Generate the query programmatically. - 修改用於排序或分頁的值。Modify the values for sorting or paging. - 執行自訂排序或分頁。Perform custom sorting or paging. - 取消資料擷取作業。Cancel the data-retrieval operation. 本項目中包含資料擷取作業的參數傳遞至事件處理常式的物件。The object that is passed to event handlers for this event contains the parameters for the data-retrieval operation. 您可以修改中的參數事件處理常式之前執行的查詢，或您可以建立新的結果集，並將其指派給屬性。You can modify the parameters in the event handler before the query executes, or you can create a new result set and assign that to the property. 您可以實作自訂的排序或分頁處理常式中，針對此事件可能會受到繫結至控制項的能力。Your ability to implement custom sorting or paging in handlers for this event might be limited by the control that is bound to the . 例如，當資料行標頭按一下控制項時，控制項就會執行自動排序這可能會覆寫任何排序您建立在事件處理常式。For example, when the column header of a control is clicked, the control performs automatic sorting which might override whatever order you establish in the event handler. 如果事件處理常式中擲回例外狀況事件，您必須處理該事件處理常式中的例外狀況。If an exception is thrown in an event handler for the event, you must handle the exception in that event handler. 例外狀況不會傳遞至事件處理常式事件 (透過屬性物件)。The exception will not be passed to an event handler for the event (through the property of the object). 屬性包含之後，會擲回的例外狀況事件。The property contains only the exceptions that are thrown after the event. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 處理常式會建立查詢來擷取值，從網頁中的字串值的陣列。The handler creates a query that retrieves values from an array of string values in the Web page. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/cs/Default3.aspx.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/vb/Default3.aspx.vb#3)] 下列範例示範如何指派方法，表示預存程序傳回之物件的屬性。The following example shows how to assign the property to the object that is returned from a method that represents a stored procedure. ```vb Protected Sub LinqDataSource_Selecting(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs) Dim exampleContext As ExampleDataContext = New ExampleDataContext() e.Result = exampleContext.GetRegisteredCustomers() End Sub ``` ```csharp protected void LinqDataSource_Selecting(object sender, LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs e) { ExampleDataContext exampleContext = new ExampleDataContext(); e.Result = exampleContext.GetRegisteredCustomers(); } ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SelectParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 取得擷取資料作業期間所使用的參數集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that are used during a data-retrieval operation.

value.span: 用於建立 Select 子句的參數。

span.span: The parameters that are used to create the Select clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項使用中的參數在執行階段建立 Select 子句的集合。The control uses parameters in the collection to create the Select clause at run time. 新增參數當您想要在 Select 子句中使用執行階段值的集合。You add parameters to the collection when you want to use run-time values in the Select clause. 比方說，您可以在其中加入參數來來代表使用者的設定檔中的屬性集合。For example, you can add a parameter to the collection to represent a property in the user's profile. 您接著可以來計算新的值從資料來源使用該屬性和值。You can then use that property and a value from the data source to calculate a new value. 如果您沒有在 Select 子句中的執行階段設定值，您不必使用集合。If you do not have to set a value at run time in the Select clause, you do not have to use the collection. 您可以定義要擷取的屬性屬性。You can define the properties to retrieve in the property. 例如，若要傳回`FirstName`並`LastName`值從資料庫資料表時，設定"Firstname，LastName"未包含任何參數。For example, to return the `FirstName` and `LastName` values from a database table, set to "FirstName, LastName" without any parameters. 若要設定值，在集合，您可以加入內某個預留位置為具名參數的屬性。To set values in the collection, you add a placeholder in the property for the named parameter. 在 Select 子句中前, 加上每一參數名稱以 @ 符號。In the Select clause, preface each parameter name with the @ symbol. 您無法使用中的參數來表示屬性名稱的集合。You cannot use a parameter in the collection to represent a property name. 若要以動態方式設定的屬性名稱的屬性建立的事件處理常式事件和自訂所需的屬性。To dynamically set the property to the name of a property, create an event handler for the event and customize the property as needed. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用使用者提供的值來計算傳回的資料中的值。The following example shows how to use a user-supplied value to calculate a value in the returned data. 使用者可以在文字方塊中的製造天數表示輸入的值。The user can enter a value in the text box that represents the number of manufacturing days. 該值除以代表天來製造產品的數目的資料庫中的值。That value is divided by a value from a database that represents the number of days to manufacture a product. 傳回的值，表示在指定天數期間可以製造的產品。The returned value indicates how many products can be manufactured during the specified number of days. 使用者的輸入包含在 Select 命令，透過集合。The user's input is included in the Select command through the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool StoreOriginalValuesInViewState { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.StoreOriginalValuesInViewState : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示資料來源的資料是否應在檢視狀態中進行儲存，以確定在更新或刪除資料前，資料未由另一個處理序變更。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the data from the data source should be stored in view state to make sure that the data has not been changed by another process before it is updated or deleted.

value.span: 如果在檢視狀態中儲存值則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the values will be stored in view state; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，當更新和刪除作業已啟用，控制項檢視狀態的所有記錄會儲存原始值。By default, when update and delete operations have been enabled, the control stores the original values for all the records in view state. 控制項儲存的所有主索引鍵的值，以及所有屬性未都標記為`UpdateCheck.Never`在`Column`屬性。The control stores values for all primary keys and all properties not marked with `UpdateCheck.Never` in the `Column` attribute. 您設定`UpdateCheck`的屬性`Column`屬性中[!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_short](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-short-md.md)]。You set the `UpdateCheck` property of the `Column` attribute in the [!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_short](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-short-md.md)]. LINQ to SQL 會更新或刪除資料之前，它會檢查在檢視狀態資料來源中的目前值的值。Before LINQ to SQL updates or deletes data, it checks the values in view state against the current values in the data source. 如果值不相符，已變更的資料來源的記錄。If the values do not match, the data source record has changed. 在此情況下，LINQ to SQL 會擲回例外狀況並不繼續更新或刪除作業。In that case, LINQ to SQL throws an exception and does not continue with the update or delete operation. 如需有關 LINQ to SQL 的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [LINQ to SQL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655)。For more information about LINQ to SQL, see [LINQ to SQL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655). 儲存原始值在檢視狀態可能會造成頁面大小變得不必要地大，而且可以公開給惡意使用者的機密資料。Storing the original values in view state can cause the page size to become unnecessarily large and can expose sensitive data to a malicious user. 您可以停用儲存檢視狀態中的值，藉由設定屬性設`false`。You can disable storing values in view state by setting the property to `false`. 如果您這麼做，您必須提供自己的方式，以確定資料已無法變更。If you do this, you must provide your own way to make sure that the data has not changed. 如果您設定屬性設`false`，原始的值不會保存在資料繫結控制項的檢視狀態。If you set the property to `false`, the original values are not persisted in view state for the data-bound control. 在此情況下，LINQ to SQL 無法驗證資料的完整性。In that case, LINQ to SQL cannot verify the integrity of the data. LINQ to SQL 將會擲回例外狀況，指出資料衝突，即使資料來源中的資料實際變更。LINQ to SQL will throw an exception that indicates a data conflict even if the data in the data source has not actually changed. 如果基礎資料來源包含時間戳記欄位，就會自動更新在更新期間，您可以只將該值儲存在檢視狀態。If the underlying data source contains a timestamp field that is automatically updated during an update, you can store only that value in view state. 在此情況下，實體類別中的時間戳記屬性設為`IsVersion=true`和所有屬性都會都設為`UpdateCheck.Never`。In that case, the timestamp property in the entity class is set to `IsVersion=true` and all the properties are set to `UpdateCheck.Never`. 因為每次變更時，該記錄中的資料，時間戳記欄位會自動更新資料庫，LINQ to SQL 會決定從該值如果資料已變更。Because a timestamp field is automatically updated by the database every time that data in that record changes, LINQ to SQL determines from that value if data has changed. 這有助於減少的檢視狀態大小，並會公開任何機密資料。This helps reduce the size of view state, and no sensitive data is exposed. LINQ to SQL 會檢查資料一致性藉由在檢視中比較時間戳記值與資料庫中的時間戳記值的狀態。LINQ to SQL will check for data consistency by comparing the timestamp value in view state with the timestamp value in the database. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 使用時間戳記與檢查資料完整性 LinqDataSource 控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e7700162-4f05-4130-81f7-3be1361027fa)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Using a Timestamp with the LinqDataSource Control to Check Data Integrity](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e7700162-4f05-4130-81f7-3be1361027fa).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TableName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TableName : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定資料內容類別中屬性或欄位的名稱，這個類別表示資料集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the property or field in the data context class that represents a data collection.

value.span: 包含屬性名稱的字串，該屬性包含資料集合。

span.span: A string that contains the name of the property that contains the data collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性名稱的屬性或欄位，表示您想要擷取的資料。Set the property to the name of the property or field that represents the data that you want to retrieve. 當您要連接至資料庫資料表中時，屬性的名稱通常是資料表的名稱相同。When you are connecting to a database table, the name of the property is usually the same as the name of the table. 當您要連接到記憶體中的資料集合時，設定屬性的屬性或欄位傳回的資料集合的名稱。When you are connecting to an in-memory data collection, set the property to the name of the property or field that returns the data collection. 您可以指派此屬性會傳回任何類型，擷取作業的屬性。You can assign a property that returns any type to the property for retrieval operations. 如果由屬性所表示之物件不會實作，則控制項將會自動包裝物件的執行個體中物件。If the object that is represented by the property does not implement , the control will automatically wrap the object in an instance of an object. 若要啟用自動更新、 插入或刪除作業，就會指派給類別屬性必須衍生自，並將屬性指派給屬性必須衍生自。To enable automatic update, insert, or delete operations, the class that is assigned to the property must derive from and the property that is assigned to the property must derive from . 如需有關如何從類別的執行個體中選取資料的資訊，請參閱屬性。For information about how to select data from an instance of a class, see the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範兩個控制項。The following example shows two controls. 其中一控制項，屬性設定為類別中的屬性。In one control, the property is set to a property in a class. 該屬性會傳回字串陣列。That property returns an array of strings. 在另控制項，屬性設定為表示資料庫資料表的屬性。In the other control, the property is set to a property that represents a database table. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Overview/cs/Default.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Overview/vb/Default.aspx#2)] 名為的類別`ExampleDataContext`，表示資料庫資料表不會顯示在此範例中。The class named `ExampleDataContext` that represents the database table is not shown in this example. 此範例正常運作，您必須建立這個類別加入 LINQ to SQL 類別具名的 Example.dbml 並拖曳資料表名為影片到[!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_short](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-short-md.md)]。For this example to work, you must create this class by adding a LINQ to SQL class named Example.dbml and dragging a table named Movie onto the [!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_short](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-short-md.md)]. 類別，名為`ExampleDataContext`屬性，名為`Movies`產生。A class named `ExampleDataContext` with a property named `Movies` is generated. 下列範例顯示名為的類別`MovieLibrary`，用來參考之控制項。The following example shows the class named `MovieLibrary` that is referenced in the control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Overview/cs/App_Code/MovieLibrary.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Overview/vb/App_Code/MovieLibrary.vb#1)]
