remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您就不必呼叫從您的程式碼的方法。Typically, you do not have to call the method from your code. 資料繫結控制項將會自動呼叫方法，當使用者採取動作來更新記錄。The data-bound control will automatically call the method when the user takes action to update a record. 明確地呼叫方法，當您想要建立自己的程序來更新資料。You explicitly call the method when you want to create your own process for updating data. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在使用者按一下按鈕之後，以程式設計方式更新資料來源中的記錄。The following example shows how to programmatically update a record in the data source after the user clicks a button. 程式碼會傳遞物件，其中包含金鑰值，物件，其中包含原始的值，以及物件，其中包含新的值來方法。The code passes a object that contains the key value, a object that contains the original values, and a object that contains the new values to the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Update#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Update/cs/Default2.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Update#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Update/vb/Default3.aspx.vb#1)] 下列範例顯示上一個範例的標記。The following example shows the markup for the previous example. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Update#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Update/cs/Default2.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Update#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Update/vb/Default3.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Updated As EventHandler(Of LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs)

summary.span: 在更新作業完成時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an update operation has finished.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件，以攔截任何例外狀況，更新作業，或若要檢查的值更新作業完成之後，輸出參數。Handle the event to catch any exceptions from the update operation or to examine the values of output parameters after the update operation has finished. 輸出參數都是從傳遞至事件處理常式的物件。The output parameters are available from the object that is passed to event handlers.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Updating As EventHandler(Of LinqDataSourceUpdateEventArgs)

summary.span: 在更新作業之前發生。

span.span: Occurs before an update operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 處理事件，以便驗證更新，以檢查是否有從資料類別，並將值更新作業之前，變更或取消更新作業的資料驗證錯誤的物件。Handle the event to validate the object to be updated, to examine data validation errors from the data class, to change a value before the update operation, or to cancel the update operation. 傳遞至事件處理常式的物件包含原始物件，以及更新的物件。The object that is passed to event handlers contains both the original object and the updated object. 如果在更新作業期間發生驗證錯誤物件包含的資料類別所擲回驗證例外狀況。If a validation error occurs during the update operation, the object contains the validation exceptions that are thrown by the data class. 如果要更新的值不符合在資料類別中，屬性的型別，或如果它未通過自訂驗證檢查，就會發生驗證錯誤。A validation error occurs if a value to be updated does not match the type of the property in the data class, or if it does not pass a custom validation check. 中的事件處理常式事件，您可以擷取驗證例外狀況並採取適當動作。In an event handler for the event, you can retrieve the validation exceptions and take appropriate action. 如果事件處理常式中擲回例外狀況事件，您必須處理該事件處理常式中的例外狀況。If an exception is thrown in an event handler for the event, you must handle the exception in that event handler. 例外狀況不會傳遞至事件處理常式事件 (透過屬性物件)。The exception will not be passed to an event handler for the event (through the property of the object). 屬性包含之後，會擲回的例外狀況事件。The property contains only the exceptions that are thrown after the event. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 程式碼比較屬性與屬性和屬性，以查看是否已變更的值。The code compares properties from the property and the property to see whether a value has changed. 如果值已變更，值為屬性設定為`true`。If the value has changed, a value of the property is set to `true`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating/cs/Default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating/vb/Default.aspx.vb#1)] 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式擷取驗證例外狀況的事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event that retrieves validation exceptions. ```vb Protected Sub LinqDataSource_Updating(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As LinqDataSourceUpdateEventArgs) If (e.Exception IsNot Nothing) Then For Each innerException As KeyValuePair(Of String, Exception) _ In e.Exception.InnerExceptions Label1.Text &= innerException.Key & ": " & _ innerException.Value.Message & "
" Next e.ExceptionHandled = True End If End Sub ``` ```csharp protected void LinqDataSource_Updating(object sender, LinqDataSourceUpdateEventArgs e) { if (e.Exception != null) { foreach (KeyValuePair innerException in e.Exception.InnerExceptions) { Label1.Text += innerException.Key + ": " + innerException.Value.Message + "
"; } e.ExceptionHandled = true; } } ``` 前一個範例會擷取驗證例外狀況。The previous example retrieves validation exceptions. 如果值不符合屬性類型，可能會擲回例外狀況。An exception might be thrown if a value does not match the type of the property. 它可能也會擲回類似下列範例中的自訂檢查。It might also be thrown from a customized check such as the one in the following example. `OnAgeChanging`方法會檢查數目`Age`屬性不是負數。The `OnAgeChanging` method checks that the number for the `Age` property is not negative. ```csharp partial void OnAgeChanging(int? value) { if (value < 0) { throw new Exception("Age cannot be a negative number."); } } ``` ```vb Private Sub OnAgeChanging(ByVal value As System.Nullable(Of Integer)) If (value < 0) Then Throw New Exception("Age cannot be a negative number.") End If End Sub ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Where { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Where : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指定針對要併入擷取之資料的資料錄，必須為 true 的條件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies what conditions must be true for a record to be included in the retrieved data.

value.span: 用於建立 Where 子句的字串。

span.span: A string that is used to create the Where clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用屬性來指定要從查詢中傳回之記錄的條件。You use the property to specify the conditions for the record to be returned from a query. 語法屬性是 LINQ Where 子句在 C# 中的語法相同。The syntax for the property is the same as the syntax for a LINQ Where clause in C#. 您指定的運算式，結果為布林值，如果運算式評估為`true`對於給定的資料列，該資料列包含在結果集中。You specify an expression that results in a Boolean value, and if the expression evaluates to `true` for a given row, the row is included in the result set. 運算式包含資料行名稱、 比較運算子和值比較，如下列範例所示：Expressions are composed of column names, comparison operators, and values to compare to, as shown in the following example: ``` ``` 若要指定多個由邏輯連結的運算式`AND`或`OR`操作員，您可使用`&&`做為邏輯 AND 運算子和`||`做為邏輯 OR 運算子，如下列範例所示：To specify multiple expressions linked by logical `AND` or `OR` operators, you use `&&` as a logical AND operator and `||` as a logical OR operator, as shown in the following example: ``` ``` 如果您想要測試對常值字串屬性，常值字串值必須用雙引號括住。If you want to test a property against a literal string value, the literal string value must be enclosed in double quotation marks. 若要在標記中這樣做，請將子句值以單引號，如下列範例所示：To do this in markup, enclose the clause value in single quotation marks, as shown in the following example: ``` ``` 若要測試程式碼中的常值字串值，請使用適用於以插入雙引號括住，如下列範例所示所使用的語言逸出字元：To test against a literal string value in code, use escape characters that are appropriate to the language you are using in order to insert double quotation marks, as shown in the following example: ```vb LinqDataSource1.Where = "Category = ""Sports""" ``` ```csharp LinqDataSource1.Where = "Category = \"Sports\""; ``` 如果您想要測試字串是否大於或小於另一個字串，您必須使用的方法類別，而不是使用`<`或`>`運算子的資料行名稱的字串值之間。If you want to test whether a string is greater than or less than another string, you must use methods of the class instead of using `<` or `>` operators between the column name and the string value. 下列範例會示範如何選取的類別，有值小於、 小於或等於資料列，大於或大於或等於 「 體育 」:The following examples show how to select rows that have Category values that are less than, less than or equal to, greater than, or greater than or equal to "Sports": ``` ``` 您也可以使用其他方法類別，例如， ，和。You can also use other methods of the class, such as , , and . 如需如何比較字串的詳細資訊，請參閱[比較的字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/comparing.md)。For more information about how to compare strings, see [Comparing Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/comparing.md). 如需有關 Where 子句語法，請參閱[C# 運算子](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0301e31f-22ad-49af-ac3c-d5eae7f0ac43)和[其中子句](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/where-clause.md)。For more information about Where clause syntax, see [C# Operators](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0301e31f-22ad-49af-ac3c-d5eae7f0ac43) and [where clause](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/where-clause.md). 除了您定義當您建立網頁的靜態值為基礎的篩選，您可以篩選根據在執行階段評估的動態值。In addition to filtering based on static values that you define when you create the Web page, you can filter based on dynamic values that are evaluated at run time. 在此情況下，您可以包含中的具名的參數屬性做為值的預留位置。In that case, you include a named parameter in the property that acts as a placeholder for the value. 您再新增具有相符名稱的參數，集合。You then add a parameter that has the matching name to the collection. 或者，您可以設定屬性，以`true`並定義中的參數集合。Alternatively, you can set the property to `true` and define the parameters in the collection. 當屬性是`true`，您就不必在包括中的具名的參數屬性。When the property is `true`, you do not have to include the named parameters in the property. 相反地，控制項會自動產生 Where 子句中的參數從屬性。Instead, the control automatically generates the Where clause from the parameters in the property. 如需如何篩選資料的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 選取和篩選 LinqDataSource 與 GridView 控制項的資料子集](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c1cca3e8-86e4-4e69-a29f-1c05b91f2205)。For more information about how to filter data, see [Walkthrough: Selecting and Filtering a Subset of Data with the LinqDataSource and GridView Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c1cca3e8-86e4-4e69-a29f-1c05b91f2205). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何篩選查詢，根據靜態條件所傳回的資料。The following example shows how to filter the data returned from a query based on a static condition. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/cs/Default5.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/vb/Default5.aspx#5)] 下列範例示範如何根據篩選資料在執行階段由使用者提供的值。The following example shows how to filter the data based on a value that is provided by the user at run time. 在此範例中控制項和頁面上顯示控制項。In this example a control and a control are displayed on the page. 當使用者選取中的值的其中一個控制從選取的控制項`Products`資料表具有資料列`UserPrice`值等於選取的值。When the user selects one of the values in the control, the control selects from the `Products` table only rows that have `UserPrice` values equal to the selected value. 控制項接著會顯示篩選過的資料。The control then displays the filtered data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/cs/Default6.aspx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/vb/Default6.aspx#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WhereParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 取得用於建立 Where 子句的參數集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that is used to create the Where clause.

value.span: 參數集合，用於在 屬性中建立 Where 子句。

span.span: A collection of the parameters that are used to create the Where clause in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項使用中的參數集合來建立 Where 子句，在執行階段。The control uses parameters in the collection to create the Where clause at run time. 新增參數集合，當您想要以程式設計方式設定一或多個條件，在 Where 子句。You add parameters to the collection when you want to programmatically set one or more of the conditions in the Where clause. 比方說，您可能會在其中搜尋記錄的值相等的最後一個名稱的資料庫資料表控制項。For example, you might search a database table for records with a last name equal to the value of a control. 在此情況下，您將參數加入文字方塊值的集合。In that case, you add a parameter to the collection for the text box value. 如果您沒有在執行階段設定值，在 Where 子句中，您就不必使用集合。If you do not have to set a value at run time in the Where clause, you do not have to use the collection. 您可以定義要擷取的欄位屬性。You can define the fields to retrieve in the property. 例如，若要從資料庫資料表傳回值所在`LastName`等於"Adams 」 在標記中，設定屬性設`'LastName = "Adams"'`不含任何參數。For example, to return values from a database table where `LastName` equals "Adams" in markup, set the property to `'LastName = "Adams"'` without any parameters. 若要設定值，在集合中，您指派給每個參數的名稱，然後再新增內某個預留位置該參數的屬性。To set values in the collection, you assign a name to each parameter and then add a placeholder in the property for that parameter. 在 Where 子句中，與每個參數名稱前加上 @ 符號。In the Where clause, preface each parameter name with the @ symbol. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用集合以動態方式建立 Where 子句。The following example shows how to use the collection to dynamically create the Where clause. 控制項會傳回值中的所有記錄`Price`資料行中的使用者所選取的值大於控制項。The control returns all the records with a value in the `Price` column that is greater than the value selected by the user in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/cs/Default6.aspx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource_Simple/vb/Default6.aspx#6)]
